title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 482.2 - Special terms and conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 482.2 - Special terms and conditions

State Regulations

No member of the board of directors of a not-for-profit
corporation may be, either at the time of application or thereafter, the chief
administrative officer, executive director, administrator, or any employee of
the corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
482.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
